caption.center: John A. CARDIN, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Hardin Circuit Court; J. Howard Holbert, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Frank E. Haddad, Jr., Louisville, for appellant.
Ed W. Hancock, Atty. Gen., Patrick B. Kinberlin III, Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion of the Court by Justice STEPHENSON, Affirming.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
